source: I can help you, my friends.
target: e mara'a ia'u 'ia tauturu ia 'ōrua, e tō'u hoa

source: My husband and I, we have lots of vegetables from our garden.
target: māua tā'u tāne, e mea rahi tā māua mā'a nō roto mai i tā māua fa'a'apu

source: which he harvested yesterday, and brought home.
target: 'o tāna i tāpū mai inanahi 'e tāna i tie mai i te fare
